thread.title: New York Bro Who Went Surfing In The Nor’easter For The First Time Might Be My Spirit Animal
thread.title_full: New York Bro Who Went Surfing In The Nor’easter For The First Time Might Be My Spirit Animal

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: New York Bro Who Went Surfing In The Nor’easter For The First Time Might Be My Spirit Animal
text:
How ’bout Stella, huh? What a dud of a storm. Just completely blew it’s wad like a two pump chump all up and down the East Coast today. Bummer we didn’t get the 20+ inch dumping the beast coast expected. It’s also why I think naming winter storms continues to be the dumbest overhype method on the planet .
This Bro, however, wins the day. He headed out to Long Beach on Long Island to try surfing “for the first time” (…eyeroll), asking NYC’s PIX 11 for a ride back to his car.
In Long Beach, which saw 3 to 4 inches of snow by noon, along with ice and slush, PIX11 caught up with a man attempting to surf for the first time ever.
“It’s a little bit sloppy,” he said of the waves, noting he had never gone out before. “I think I’ll try surfing again … this is like, my first time surfing.”
He’s the Spicoli-with-a-stach the world needs. Glad you got out there today, Bro.
